protein.specific_function: Regulates and initiates biosynthesis of N-acetylneuraminic acid (NeuAc), a precursor of sialic acids. Plays an essential role in early development (By similarity). Required for normal sialylation in hematopoietic cells. Sialylation is implicated in cell adhesion, signal transduction, tumorigenicity and metastatic behavior of malignant cells.

pathway.name: Amino sugar and nucleotide sugar metabolism

go_class.description: racemase and epimerase activity, acting on carbohydrates and derivatives
phosphotransferase activity, alcohol group as acceptor
